Author: GitHub
Description:
Tired of your AI assistant lacking the right project context? This deep dive into GitHub Copilot Spaces shows you the solution. Vanessa Kalu, a Product Manager at GitHub, demos how to use Spaces to bring together all the files, repos, and issues Copilot needs to give you accurate, grounded answers, helping you fix bugs faster.

#GitHub #CopilotSpaces #GitHubCopilot

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 What is GitHub Copilot Spaces? 00:50 Demo: Using Spaces to solve an issue 02:19 What content can be added to a space? 04:58 Generating and iterating on a pull request 06:58 Sharing, collaboration, and IDE access 08:04 Use cases and future roadmap 09:46 Conclusion

Title: How Copilot Spaces gives your AI the right project context | GitHub Checkout
